p: Corticosteroids were frequently used to suppress the elevated cytokine levels in patients with SARS-CoV 27, 28 and MERS-CoV 29, 30. However, there are no evidence showing that the mortality of SARS and MERS patients was reduced by the treatment with corticosteroids, while the clearance of viral was delayed by such treatment 31- 33. Consequently, corticosteroids are not suggested to systemically use in SARS-CoV-2 infected patients 34, 35.
